summary: Makes archery silent - the arrow makes no noise on release and so the chance of detection is much lower when sneaking.
descriptionHtml:
[b]V2[/b] This merges the idea from one of my other mods - this version has craftable (silenced) versions of all arrows and also the noisemaker arrow. All with lore-friendly sounds and ingredients.

[b]V1[/b] Optional file makes all archery silent - all bows and arrows now make no noise and so the chance of detection is much lower when sneaking.

--
[b]Silenced arrows[/b] utilising the ancient knowledge of Alchemy: 
You can create them at the forge using 5 normal arrows and vampire dust. The arrow makes no noise on release and so the chance of detection is much lower when sneaking.

--
[b]Noisemaker Arrows[/b] from a Dwemer design: 
You can create them at the forge using Dwemer Arrows, Leather Strips, Glowing Mushrooms and Mudcrab Chitin. They make the sound of crunching chitin where they strike - distracting nearby enemies (at a large radius).

--
Recommended Mods:
I highly recommend using [url=/downloads/file.php?id=4719]Weapons and Armor Fixes [/url] as it fixes many item irregularities (including Nightingale bow noise level)

--
[b]Caveats[/b]:
Bows and arrows added by other mods are unaffected

--
[b]Credits[/b]:
Made by request of F0EH4MMER & moebius989
author: ScarabMonkey

files.name: ScarabMonkeySilentArchery_1-0
files.changelogHtml: Makes all archery silent - all bows and arrows

Added the noisemaker arrow
